resources.string: This sample demonstrates the Survey Management invite type, which denotes that the survey is presented at the point where the user accepts the invitation. To trigger an invite, click increment significant event button 3 times then click the "Check eligibility" button. The SDK transitions to an idle state after an invite is displayed. Use "Reset State" to test again. Follow the instructions below to check eligibility. Internet connection is required.
Once the invite is shown, the SDK drops into an idle state until the repeat days have elapsed. Click here to reset the state of the SDK.
